item.title: Push Notifications, the good, the bad, and the wtf could u not
item.description: Why you should give people more control over the notifications they receive from you.

item.title: My real problem with in-app rating modules
item.description: Early work on in-app rating modules and how I made them better. This was before Apple launched their own in-app rating system.
